title: Home Safety Hotline Directly Download
description:
Hearing noises? Seeing things? Call Home Safety Hotline Our operators are standing by, waiting to give you the answers you need to protect your home from all manner of pests and household hazards. War Hospital
Home Safety Hotline is an analog horror inspired telephone operator simulator where you answer incoming callers’ questions about what’s inside their home. Read through a vast catalog of common pests and household hazards, and do your best to become an expert in home safety. You will be held responsible for what happens.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
